archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Situations and Geofencing data sharing
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Road owners and regulators need to inform the road users on deviating Situations on the roads. That could be that a road is closed or road work is ongoing. Geographic areas (geofences) could also be temporarily regulated, for instance extra rush hour cost, or some benefits of using zero-emitting transport in an area.
Situations and Geofences defined in an area could be shared to 3rd party actors.
